heading: Senior Copywriter and Content Writer - Limitless Marketing Agency
body: 1- Attending Brainstorming and generating creative and effective ideas for accounts.
2- Content writing: posts, articles, and slogans for each account.
3- Editing content written by junior copywriters.
4- content creation and content writing for the firm's social initiative BookPowers  (generating ideas - research for topics discussed - content writing and editing - social media platforms manager)
